SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.communication

Interface ClientNotificationListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController
public interface ClientNotificationListener
this class should be implemented from the client class that handles the notification, being it a controller or a directly the view, the client MUST use only one instance of this class

      Notifies a points update
      Parameters:

    • notifyHello

      void notifyHello(boolean lobbyReady, String firstPlayerId, boolean loadedGame)
      Notifies the hello, communicating the status of the server
      Parameters:
      lobbyReady - true if the lobby is ready
      firstPlayerId - 'NoFirst' if it is not a first player, otherwise the first player id
      loadedGame - true if the game is loaded
